about_the_game:
Amerta is a dark, narrative-driven side scrolling games . The game it's all about time. What happened in the past will affect the future. You will be trapped in a recurring time to solve challenging puzzles. Avoid dangerous creatures to avoid death.

Synopsis

When the world is covered by a mist, it creates chaos throughout the world. Besides making living things mutate, the mist affects space and time, making things worse. In the midst of the chaos, you are trapped in time and trying to break free from it.

Meet with Eon

Eon is a tough, brave girl trapped in an apocalyptic situation caused by a mysterious mist that blankets the world. The mist has mutated living creatures and disrupted the fabric of time, creating chaos and danger at every turn. Eon finds herself stuck in a recurring time loop, trying to solve the mysteries of this warped reality and escape from the endless cycle. Though she's caught in this unpredictable world, Eon refuses to be defeated

Features

  • Challenging Puzzle Related to Time

  • Sprint, Grab, Jump
